verses.t: LordNot unto us, O {H3068}, not unto us, but unto thy name{H8034} give{H5414} glory{H3519}, for thy mercy{H2617}, and for thy truth's{H571} sake.
Wherefore should the heathen{H1471} say{H559}, Where is now their God{H430}?
But our God{H430} is in the heavens{H8064}: he hath done{H6213} whatsoever he hath pleased{H2654}.
Their idols{H6091} are silver{H3701} and gold{H2091}, the work{H4639} of men's{H120} hands{H3027}.
They have mouths{H6310}, but they speak{H1696} not: eyes{H5869} have they, but they see{H7200} not:
They have ears{H241}, but they hear{H8085} not: noses{H639} have they, but they smell{H7306} not:
They have hands{H3027}, but they handle{H4184} not: feet{H7272} have they, but they walk{H1980} not: neither speak{H1897} they through their throat{H1627}.
They that make{H6213} them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth{H982} in them.
O Israel{H3478}, trust{H982} Lordthou in the {H3068}: he is their help{H5828} and their shield{H4043}.
O house{H1004} of Aaron{H175}, trust{H982} Lordin the {H3068}: he is their help{H5828} and their shield{H4043}.
Ye that fear{H3373} Lordthe {H3068}, trust{H982} Lordin the {H3068}: he is their help{H5828} and their shield{H4043}.
LordThe {H3068} hath been mindful{H2142} of us: he will bless{H1288} us; he will bless{H1288} the house{H1004} of Israel{H3478}; he will bless{H1288} the house{H1004} of Aaron{H175}.
He will bless{H1288} them that fear{H3373} Lordthe {H3068}, both small{H6996} and great{H1419}.and: Heb. with
LordThe {H3068} shall increase{H3254} you more and more, you and your children{H1121}.
Ye are blessed{H1288} Lordof the {H3068} which made{H6213} heaven{H8064} and earth{H776}.
The heaven{H8064}, even the heavens{H8064}, are Lord'sthe {H3068}: but the earth{H776} hath he given{H5414} to the children{H1121} of men{H120}.
The dead{H4191} praise{H1984} Lordnot the {H3050}, neither any that go down{H3381} into silence{H1745}.
But we will bless{H1288} Lordthe {H3050} from this time forth and for{H5704} evermore{H5769}. Praise{H1984} Lordthe {H3050}.
